title: Man Medium Skin Tone Curly Hair
alsoKnownAs: Curly Haired Man Medium Skin Tone
description: A man with curly hair and a medium skin tone. Represents a male individual with textured hair and a neutral complexion.
apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji depicts a man with a warm, medium skin tone, his hair a cascade of defined, springy curls rendered with Appleâ€™s signature 3D shading and soft, rounded edges. The realistic lighting catches the subtle highlights in his hair and on his face, conveying a friendly and approachable demeanor. On Apple devices, this emoji often signifies individuality, a relaxed vibe, or can be used to represent a person with similar features in digital conversations.
